title: Chadthedeveloper
author: Chadthedeveloper
created_time: August 29, 2023, 03:25:11 PMLast edit: September 01, 2023, 12:35:32 AM by Chadthedeveloper

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Hello and welcome to this forum. There is nothing wrong with offering your code here, though it would have been better if you posted this in the service section of the forum. Anyways, Be aware there have been other cases of newbies who join just to try to sell their casino code and some of them have tried to do so with code or software which does not actually belongs to them.Instead redirecting people to your personal Telegram you may inspire more trust if you let us try the demo through a link, instead asking you in a private message for it. Good luck and hopefully you will get paid for your effort in the future.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on August 29, 2023, 04:31:36 PMHello and welcome to this forum. There is nothing wrong with offering your code here, though it would have been better if you posted this in the service section of the forum. Anyways, Be aware there have been other cases of newbies who join just to try to sell their casino code and some of them have tried to do so with code or software which does not actually belongs to them.Instead redirecting people to your personal Telegram you may inspire more trust if you let us try the demo through a link, instead asking you in a private message for it. Good luck and hopefully you will get paid for your effort in the future.  What you said is correct. Op should be transparent and allow people here to see the demo. The service board is the best place to drop this thread because it is concerning a service to be rendered. So there is the best. For transparency purpose op should do everything here and only discuss the important personal information on telegram. And for now there is no need to corner someone to telegram and discuss business. Let the forum confirm the working of the code first and when the recommendations has been given then the interested persons can contact you by pm or the telegram handle to discuss things.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. Maybe the best place to post this one is in this board?  Project Development.But in any case though, I'm just quite surprised by the price, I thought that casino projects or at least the front end development is going to be to the tune of thousands of dollars.And I also like the proposal of @Hispo with some demo code so that everyone can see how good the software is for that price.Good luck though.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: btc_angela on August 29, 2023, 09:20:01 PMWelcome to the forum. Maybe the best place to post this one is in this board?  Project Development.But in any case though, I'm just quite surprised by the price, I thought that casino projects or at least the front end development is going to be to the tune of thousands of dollars.And I also like the proposal of @Hispo with some demo code so that everyone can see how good the software is for that price.Good luck though.It is worth thousands of dollars and we will only have an idea if the price is really that worth it if we can see a demo of that casino script he is selling, he should also offer escrow. He mentioned that login, deposits, and withdrawals are done through Wallet Connect, so Bitcoin is not accepted, here since you have to connect your wallet unless you can give an instruction to accept Bitcoin or configure the casino I have a feeling that the casino is based on DeFi environment, OP should confirm this and give us additional information.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP would it not be better you further communicate here everything about your deal for transparency purpose so as not to cast doubt on your reliability. It is well known that scammers do opt or prefer telegram because of their ill intensions when it comes to scamming people and wiping off all  traces. It is well known that telegram is where all nefarious act takes place. I will advise you use this platform and this thread to further communicate with anyone interested in your offer so there will be a little atom of confidence in dealing with you OP.With respect to your post, just as you were advised earlier, you can move this topic to the service board there you can get more potential clients interested in your services.Lastly, a demo could allow for proper scrutiny of  how the casino code works and knowing the prototype of  the source code too would be better.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Chadthedeveloper on August 29, 2023, 03:25:11 PMI'm selling the source code of Crypto Casino I developed because I didn't recive my payouts as promised.Where did you not receive your payout? I ask this because you mentioned it here.QuoteLogging, deposits and withdraws are done with Wallet Connect so it's secured, easy and fast to use. Does this mean that this is a contract-based casino since all actions are done by connecting the users' wallets?QuoteBlockchains supported: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, and Solana(Takes 1 min to add any custom token inside these blockchains)I have demo casino live for those who are interested. I'll help with setuping and customizationPrice: $750 or offerContact via telegram: chadbetcomHow many casinos are using your source code and why is this cheap, you also failed to mention that the seller should have a ready domain and hosting so you can help with the setup and customization, do you have documentation of this script, in case the buyer cannot reach you anymore for additional modification.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on August 29, 2023, 11:22:49 PMQuote from: btc_angela on August 29, 2023, 09:20:01 PMWelcome to the forum. Maybe the best place to post this one is in this board?  Project Development.But in any case though, I'm just quite surprised by the price, I thought that casino projects or at least the front end development is going to be to the tune of thousands of dollars.And I also like the proposal of @Hispo with some demo code so that everyone can see how good the software is for that price.Good luck though.It is worth thousands of dollars and we will only have an idea if the price is really that worth it if we can see a demo of that casino script he is selling, he should also offer escrow. He mentioned that login, deposits, and withdrawals are done through Wallet Connect, so Bitcoin is not accepted, here since you have to connect your wallet unless you can give an instruction to accept Bitcoin or configure the casino I have a feeling that the casino is based on DeFi environment, OP should confirm this and give us additional information.Yes, that's what I was saying, we don't have any idea however, you will have to question why the price is cheap. Not sure about Wallet Connect, but I'm thinking if he can customized it to accept not just altcoins but also bitcoin because that's what majority of casinos are offering.And maybe when a potential buyer ask for a customized script, then maybe that's where they will be caught by OP as he can charge thousands of dollars for customization and who knows, perhaps support as well.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: btc_angela on August 30, 2023, 12:35:31 PMYes, that's what I was saying, we don't have any idea however, you will have to question why the price is cheap. Not sure about Wallet Connect, but I'm thinking if he can customized it to accept not just altcoins but also bitcoin because that's what majority of casinos are offering.And maybe when a potential buyer ask for a customized script, then maybe that's where they will be caught by OP as he can charge thousands of dollars for customization and who knows, perhaps support as well.It's suspicious selling a source code that cheap, he'll have to prove that he owns the source code not posting a demo is questionable alone if you're a script developer you are proud to show a demo and the accompanying documentation, there was a guy selling a source code of one casino but in fact, he is just a reseller or a buyer who just decoded the script.It's hard to justify selling cheap casino software because you did not get your payout from a source you did not mention.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on August 30, 2023, 01:19:10 PM-snip-There is some possibility (source-code copycat).He copy-paste the source code from other casinos, so not actually edit the code hardly (like build from the bottom). That's why is cheap (there also have some tough about template code as well).

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on August 30, 2023, 01:19:10 PMQuote from: btc_angela on August 30, 2023, 12:35:31 PMYes, that's what I was saying, we don't have any idea however, you will have to question why the price is cheap. Not sure about Wallet Connect, but I'm thinking if he can customized it to accept not just altcoins but also bitcoin because that's what majority of casinos are offering.And maybe when a potential buyer ask for a customized script, then maybe that's where they will be caught by OP as he can charge thousands of dollars for customization and who knows, perhaps support as well.It's suspicious selling a source code that cheap, he'll have to prove that he owns the source code not posting a demo is questionable alone if you're a script developer you are proud to show a demo and the accompanying documentation, there was a guy selling a source code of one casino but in fact, he is just a reseller or a buyer who just decoded the script.It's hard to justify selling cheap casino software because you did not get your payout from a source you did not mention. To be fair, we have no idea on what the personal or financial situation of OP is, he may be desperate enough to offer that source code at that cheap due to an infinity of reasons, considering his story of not being paid what he needed , though, I agree with you when you say he should have linked to a demo and shown proof of ownership of this project. Since he has not yet provided clarification, I assume he already left this forum when he saw we started to ask for things he cannot give and we are not so easy to be sold whatever he is trying to sell around.  Whenever something is too cheap to be true, assume it is a scam, folks.
